Reference

ggplot2 theme

theme_pwd()

A ggplot2 theme for PWD

scale_color_pwd() scale_colour_pwd() scale_fill_pwd()

Color scale constructor for PWD colors

pwd_geoms() undo_pwd_geoms()

Replace the default color and fill options with PWD themed colors

Creates PWD Report

Creates PWD Meeting Agenda

fonts

font_cal font_cal_light

Calibri Font variables

Open Sans Font Variables

Public Sans Font variables

Import the Open Sans Font

import_public_sans()

Import the Public Sans font

Color palettes

pwd_pals() view_pwd_palette()

Return function to interpolate a PWD color palette
